titleStmt.title: The prophesie of Mother Shipton, in the reigne of King Henry the Eighth Foretelling the death of Cardinall Wolsey, the Lord Percy and others, as also what should happen in ensuing times.
titleStmt.author: Shipton, Mother (Ursula)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Lownds, at his shop adjoyning to Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
